sentence.Network_en: She became quite a notable director in the thirties and forties.
sentence.Network_cn: 她在三四十年代成了一位名导演。

sentence.Network_en: Her mother had bundled all her Forties clothes up and burnt them.
sentence.Network_cn: 她母亲把她四十几岁时穿的所有衣服都包起来烧掉了。

sentence.Network_en: I went on competing till I was in my middle forties.
sentence.Network_cn: 我继续参赛，直到45岁左右。

entry.tran: 四十多，四十几(指从40至49的数字)
entry.def: When you talk about the forties, you are referring to numbers between 40 and 49. For example, if you are in your forties, you are aged between 40 and 49. If the temperature is in the forties, the temperature is between 40 and 49 degrees.

example.ex: He was a big man in his forties, smartly dressed in a suit and tie.
example.tran: 他是一个四十多岁的高大男子，穿西装打领带，看上去很精神。

entry.tran: 二十世纪四十年代(指从 1940 年至 1949 年)
entry.def: The forties is the decade between 1940 and 1949.

example.ex: Steel cans were introduced sometime during the forties.
example.tran: 钢罐是 20 世纪 40 年代时开始使用的。

means.word_mean: 1. the time of life between 40 and 50
